title: [Patch 6.7] Check out the info on the Rotating Game Modes

embed.description: Greetings, Summoners. Welcome to Patch 6.7, the one where we drain some extraneous power from some top-tier picks and buff Irelia. We'd make a joke about buffing / nerfing Irelia, but the cold, hard fact is that as of this month we are net neutral on Irelia changes acrossfour years.

body:
> Rotating game modes provide unique spins on the classic League formula. We’re introducing a queue that’ll bring the alternative action on weekends with a suite of familiar game modes and maybe a fresh face or two.

Ascension is up first, starting this Friday! Learn more in the [release announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/gameplay/announcing-rotating-game-mode-queue).

**WEEKEND WARRIORS:** The Rotating queue is available starting on Friday afternoon around 4 PM server time and closes up shop very early Monday morning

**BECAUSE IT ROTATES, SEE:** The Rotating Game Mode queue offers at least one game mode per weekend over several weeks

**SPIN CYCLE:** We’ll publish a schedule of upcoming modes on Leagueoflegends.com before they’re available to play

**FLEXIBLE MASTERY:** Champion Mastery is available in all Rotating queue game modes, allowing you to earn points for champs you play as well as enabling Hextech Crafting chest drops for S scores and the chance at key fragments for wins

replies.body: So, is this where we start crying on the misconception that we'll only get 4 days of URF this year? Or have we figured it out by now?

What I missed until just now was "queue offers at least one game mode per weekend".

*At least one*

Possibility of multiple modes. Nice.
That is poor wording on part of the patch notes. :/ There will be only one game mode enabled at a time. Soz for confusion. m(＿＿)m

The "over several weeks" part is a bit ambiguous as well.

Do you mean that the **same** game mode will be available on weekends for several weeks?

Or that the **cycle**, with various game modes, will last several weeks?
